statements: DELETE FROM schedules WHERE id = 1 AND transport_mode = 'Bus';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE route_name = 'Route A' AND departure_time < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM schedules WHERE departure_time < '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND arrival_time > '2023-01-01T00:00:00Z' AND route_id = 'f311e7e7-26bd-44b5-a969-426d626f3919';
DELETE FROM Trains WHERE train_route_id = 10 AND train_schedule < '2022-01-01 10:00:00';
DELETE FROM Buses WHERE bus_id = 5 AND bus_schedule <= '2022-01-01 12:00:00';
DELETE FROM Trains WHERE train_schedule < NOW() - INTERVAL '1 day';
